title: Design of a Cloud-Based Personalized Language Learning System

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency and elementary-level language comprehension
context.additional_context: Flexible learning design for working professionals enabling concurrent job performance, with real-time interaction via cloud-based systems

learning_goals: Learners can design personalized learning paths on cloud platforms with 80% accuracy
Learners effectively select job-related language content three or more times using an AI recommendation system
Learners conduct peer assessments and feedback two or more times using real-time collaboration tools

resources: Cloud E-Learning Platform (Google Classroom, AWS Educate)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
